name: Cannon Brawl (itch)
description:
Sharks! Pirates! Who will get the treasure first? 

Pick your team, customize your ship, and battle it out for the treasure. 

Cannon Brawl, the 2022 Volition Game Design of Galactic Excellence  Award winner, is a 2D tabletop game where you can customize your ship before shooting cannons at the opposing team. Use powerups to help in your battle for the treasure and be the last one standing. Will you be victorious? 

(This game is designed to be played via tabletop with a touch table where you play side by side with someone)
